Glaive Two-Handed Extra Reach

Drakethroat Glaive is one of the Glaive Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Drakethroat Glaive is a powerful glaive for Dragonborn characters that gives disadvantage to enemies on their saving throws against racial breath weapon.
